description: An API operation used by the Systems Manager console to display information about Systems Manager managed nodes.

parameters.name: InstancePropertyFilterList
parameters.description: An array of instance property filters. (dict) --- Describes a filter for a specific list of managed nodes. You can filter node information by using tags. You specify tags by using a key-value mapping. The name of the filter. The filter values. (string) ---

parameters.name: FiltersWithOperator
parameters.description: The request filters to use with the operator. (dict) --- The filters to describe or get information about your managed nodes. The filter key name to describe your managed nodes. (string) --- Operator (string) --- The operator used by the filter call.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The filter key name to describe your managed nodes.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter key name to describe your managed nodes.

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The operator used by the filter call.

nested_items.name: InstanceProperties
nested_items.description: Properties for the managed instances.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The value of the EC2 Name tag associated with the node. If a Name tag hasn't been applied to the node, this value is blank.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the managed node.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the managed node. For example, t3.large.

nested_items.name: InstanceRole
nested_items.description: The instance profile attached to the node. If an instance profile isn't attached to the node, this value is blank.

nested_items.name: KeyName
nested_items.description: The name of the key pair associated with the node. If a key pair isnt't associated with the node, this value is blank.

nested_items.name: InstanceState
nested_items.description: The current state of the node.

nested_items.name: Architecture
nested_items.description: The CPU architecture of the node. For example, x86_64.

nested_items.name: IPAddress
nested_items.description: The public IPv4 address assigned to the node. If a public IPv4 address isn't assigned to the node, this value is blank.

nested_items.name: LaunchTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the node was launched.

nested_items.name: PingStatus
nested_items.description: Connection status of the SSM Agent on the managed node.

nested_items.name: LastPingDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the SSM Agent last pinged the Systems Manager service.

nested_items.name: AgentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of SSM Agent running on your managed node.

nested_items.name: PlatformType
nested_items.description: The operating system platform type of the managed node. For example, Windows Server or Amazon Linux 2.

nested_items.name: PlatformName
nested_items.description: The name of the operating system platform running on your managed node.

nested_items.name: PlatformVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the OS platform running on your managed node.

nested_items.name: ActivationId
nested_items.description: The activation ID created by Systems Manager when the server or virtual machine (VM) was registered.

nested_items.name: IamRole
nested_items.description: The IAM role used in the hybrid activation to register the node with Systems Manager.

nested_items.name: RegistrationDate
nested_items.description: The date the node was registered with Systems Manager.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of managed node.

nested_items.name: ComputerName
nested_items.description: The fully qualified host name of the managed node.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the State Manager association applied to the managed node.

nested_items.name: LastAssociationExecutionDate
nested_items.description: The date the association was last run.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulAssociationExecutionDate
nested_items.description: The last date the association was successfully run.

nested_items.name: AssociationOverview
nested_items.description: Status information about the aggregated associations.

nested_items.name: DetailedStatus
nested_items.description: Detailed status information about the aggregated associations.

nested_items.name: InstanceAssociationStatusAggregatedCount
nested_items.description: The number of associations for the managed nodes.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: SourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the source resource.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the source resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of properties to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
